title: Global gold button backgrounds and static gold body text styling

requirements.summary: Force all buttons across the app to render with a shimmering gold background, overriding Tailwind/Shadcn background utilities without modifying immutable Shadcn source files.
acceptanceCriteria: No visible buttons render with a navy/blue background in any major surfaces (Home, Product Detail, Cart, Checkout, Customer Dashboard, Admin Dashboard, header navigation).
Primary/secondary/outline/ghost/destructive Shadcn-based buttons still render with the shimmering gold background (or a gold-toned variant where appropriate), not default navy/blue.
Implementation does not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable).

file_operations.description: Update the global button styling rules to (1) stop accidentally clearing button backgrounds and (2) apply a shimmering gold gradient background using higher-specificity selectors and !important on background-image/background-color so Tailwind/Shadcn bg-* utilities (e.g., bg-primary, bg-secondary, bg-transparent) cannot force navy/blue backgrounds across storefront, admin, and header/footer. Keep changes centralized in this global stylesheet.

requirements.summary: Make all button label text (and icons) render with a metallic silver treatment on top of the shimmering gold background, isolated from global non-button text rules.
acceptanceCriteria: All button text appears metallic silver (not dark/black, not gold) on all buttons across the app.
Button icons (if present) match the metallic silver color treatment.
Non-button text styling changes do not accidentally override button text styling.

file_operations.description: Adjust global button typography styling so button text and button-contained icons inherit a metallic silver color treatment (using color/currentColor and appropriate overrides with !important), while ensuring global non-button text gradient rules never apply to button labels (scope exclusions to button descendants rather than the button element itself to avoid removing button backgrounds).

requirements.summary: Replace the global shimmering silver body text effect with a static (non-animated) shimmering gold text finish for non-button text across the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Non-button text no longer animates (no shimmer movement) anywhere in the app.
Non-button text uses a gold metallic/shimmer gradient appearance (static) instead of silver.
Buttons continue to render independently from the non-button text rules (no gold-text gradient applied to button labels unless explicitly intended by REQ-2).

file_operations.description: Replace the current global silver shimmer text gradient with a gold metallic/shimmer gradient for non-button text and remove the animation (set animation: none). Keep text clipping behavior for the metallic look, and explicitly exclude buttons and button descendants from these non-button text rules so button labels remain governed by the button-specific metallic silver rules from REQ-2.
